          <title>
            <string language="en">The electrolysis of salt solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Elektrolyse der Salzlösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'électrolyse de la solution de sel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O electrolysis da solução de sal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'elettrolisi della soluzione salina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ηλεκτρόλυση της αλατισμένης λύσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La electrólisis de la solución de sal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how other chemical substances can be obtained from the electrolysis of salt in solution. This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrolysis</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">negative electrodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive electrodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie andere chemische 
Substanzen von der Elektrolyse des Salzes in gelöster Form erreicht 
werden können. Dieses kann in einer beschriftenden Übung 
verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment d'autres substances 
chimiques peuvent être obtenues à partir de l'électrolyse du sel en
solution. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como outras substâncias 
químicas podem ser obtidas do electrolysis do sal na solução. 
Isto pode ser usado em um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come altre sostanze chimiche
possono essere ottenute dall'elettrolisi di sale in soluzione. 
Ciò può essere usata in un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς άλλες χημικές 
ουσίες μπορούν να ληφθούν από την ηλεκτρόλυση του άλατος στη 
λύση. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση 
μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo otras sustancias 
químicas se pueden obtener de la electrólisis de la sal en la 
solución. Esto se puede utilizar en un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
